name: Dark Arrivals
description:
Stuck on a space station, with some sort of creature, you need to escape. The shuttle is the only way, but to fly out of here you'll need some items. Getting to these items is going to be tough, maybe you can find some survivers to help you out. Working togethor means you're more likely to survive.

Stronger // Togethor

Controls:

W A S D - Move
E - Interact and open doors
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Shoot (If you have a gun)
Q - Swap char's when in safe zone.
ESC / P - Pause

Credits:
Blood_Jackal23, MrScientist, Lytesande, Joshlynn, Sad-Scoops
Programming: Blood_Jackal23, MrScientist and Joshlynn
Art:  Lytesander,

Music: Lytesander
SFX: Lytesander and MrScientist

Assets Used:
Stationgen by Wyvern Industries,
Top Down Shooter - 1 by Pixelboy and Spaceship Tiles by NettySvit
